com.example.rarog_countbook

Class Counter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.rarog_countbook.Counter

  • public class Counter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is what is used to describe a single counter, all counters are a instance of this class. Holds all information pertaining to counters as well as getters and setters for each field.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Oliver Rarog

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Counter(int initialValue, java.lang.String counterName, java.lang.String comment)
      Constructor for the counter class, creates a counter object

               java.lang.String counterName,

        Constructor for the counter class, creates a counter object
        Parameters:
        initialValue - the initial value of the counter
        counterName - the given name of the counter
        comment - optional - if user wants to add a comment to the counter
